name: places/ChIJCZOWXY5ZwokRCAdTJa0CWzo
adrFormatAddress: 831 Broadway, New York, NY 10003, USA

originalText.text: I initially contacted Neil about a property that he had listed, which unfortunately couldn't work out for me as it was an income restricted Co-op for which I didn't qualify. However, we stayed in contact and the next time I was in town, Neil lined up some apartments for me to look at and also gave me a list of several open houses that I was able to look at on my own. He carefully listened to my requirements and my wish list and found places that fit what I was looking for and in a price point that I was comfortable with. One of them was perfect for what I needed, and once I made the decision to put in an offer on the unit, Neil walked me through the entire process and was there every step of the way, with all kinds of advice, suggestions and information as to the best way to proceed. The entire process was very smooth and I just closed today. I couldn't be happier and would recommend Neil wholeheartedly without reservation.

originalText.text:
Having to sell my apartment during a downturn in Manhattan real estate, and having little recent experience of real estate transactions, I relied on recommendations from a lawyer who does a lot of business in the area.

Neil Tilbury made a very good impression from the beginning, when he researched other apartments for sale in my building and block, not only using online listings (which everyone does these days) but even visiting some of the apartments in person to get more information. He already knew a bit about the neighborhood but did some additional research as well, showing a genuine curiosity about the city. His estimate of what the apartment could sell for was based on well thought out considerations and turned out to be on target. Working with a very good professional photographer, he had some very nice pictures taken in the apartment. He also had good advice about fixing small problems that could make the place less desirable to buyers.

In dealing with everyone, including potential buyers, Neil is always calm and polite. He is very dependable in returning phone calls or showing up on time for appointments with buyers. If there are problems, Neil is very persistent in trying to find a solution, without getting angry or giving up. He had good advice for handling various offers that I received during the sales process (some serious, some not) and kept the process moving along. After the sale was agreed he was helpful in planning all the little steps required to get to the closing and kept in touch with the buyer's broker.

I would use Neil's services again without hesitation and I recommend him highly.

originalText.text: Neil is a perfect real estate expert to work with. He is very knowledgeable about the New York market and he always recommended me great options matching my personal needs. Neil is also very patient, responsive and friendly. He understood my situation and answered my questions effectively. With his consistent help, I successfully purchased my first condo and I'm very happy with the high quality. I would absolutely recommend Neil to anyone who is considering buying real estate in New York.

originalText.text: I would highly recommend Neil Tilbury for any of your real estate needs. Neil was extremely reliable, always on time with a smile on his face. Neil always answered my emails within minutes, gave me his personal phone number to use and would take phone calls at any hour. Since it was my first time home buying, Neil took the time to figure out what I wanted and needed. The purchasing process took a lot longer than expected for me, and Neil was supportive and patient the whole time. He gave great insight and helpful tips. Many real estate brokers can be sharks, or even lazy and unwilling to do extra work. Neil is not one of those brokers, I would highly recommend him to anyone.

originalText.text: 100% recommended!! If you are looking for a realtor, look no further! I have worked several times with Neil, all of which were easy, seamless, stress-free experiences; not only is he very experienced and extremely professional but he is still a really nice, down-to-earth person who is accessible. He knows NYC like a native due to his decades of experience here. He is patient and understanding, yet always on-the-ball, detail-oriented, and a fantastic, clear communicator. I recommend him without any reservation, as he is honest and smart and an absolute pleasure to deal with.
